spørgsmål: 2x2 contingency table?
anbefaling: use two-sample test for binomial proportions, or 2x2 contingency table methods if no confounding is present or the mantel-haenszel test if confounding is present. P 354,362,,364

spørgsmål: Categorical data?
anbefaling: Use another underlying distribution or use nonparametric methods such as kruskal-wallis test. P. 556-557

spørgsmål: Interested in trend over k binomial proportions?
anbefaling: Use chi-square test for trend, if no confounding is present or the Mantel Extension test if confounding is present. P. 364+623

spørgsmål: Interested in trend over k binomial proportions?
anbefaling: Use chi-square test for heterogeneity for 2xk tables p. 392
